javatools.datatypes

Class PQRTree.Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • javatools.datatypes.PQRTree.Node
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PQRTree.Leaf
    Enclosing class:
    PQRTree<E>

    public class PQRTree.Node
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a PQR Tree node
